name: mutual-fund-exit-suite-tests
description: Comprehensive test suite for Mutual Fund Exit Suite functionality

scripts.test:auth: node -e "const tester = require('./test_mutual_fund_exit_suite.js'); const t = new tester(); t.testAuthentication().then(() => console.log('Auth test completed'));"
scripts.test:endpoints: node -e "const tester = require('./test_mutual_fund_exit_suite.js'); const t = new tester(); t.testBackendEndpoints().then(() => console.log('Endpoints test completed'));"
scripts.test:database: node -e "const tester = require('./test_mutual_fund_exit_suite.js'); const t = new tester(); t.testDatabaseOperations().then(() => console.log('Database test completed'));"

author: FINREP Development Team
